Class MediaEvent

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    public class MediaEvent
extends AbstractEvent<android.os.Parcelable>
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Immutable object the describes a media event.
